favourite.article: Lord Jesus, thank YOU for accepting me. Thank YOU that YOU are the lover of my soul. You saved me and my family by Your mercy and grace. Forgive me for my shortcomings. Make and keep me pure within. I love YOU Lord Jesus! I and my family will serve and love YOU unto eternity.
How truly beautiful this hymn! PRAISE THE GOD OF OUR SALVATION for the glorious truths it proclaims! "Other refuge have I none, hangs my helpless soul on Thee!"
Often it's only when we cry out to the Lord that we find the river of grace, and we experience hiding in the Lord Jesus.
